definition: to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: White spot syndrome virus (WSSV) disease is a key problem in shrimp culture industry in Asian countries.
sentences.chinese: 對蝦WSSV病是亞洲對蝦養殖業中的一個棘手問題。

sentences.english: Fish hatchery is also an important industry in Tunghsiao.
sentences.chinese: 養殖業也是通霄的重要產業。

sentences.english: Aflatoxin can induce many kinds of diseases and do very great danger to the feeding.
sentences.chinese: 黃麴黴毒素誘發多種疾病，對養殖業造成很大的危害。

sentences.english: Chapter six is our measures of export oriented mariculture under the requirements of WTO.
sentences.chinese: 第六章提出WTO框架下我國海水養殖業的政策取向。

sentences.english: Disease outbreaks are a serious constraint to aquaculture development.
sentences.chinese: 病害暴發嚴重製約了水產養殖業的發展。

sentences.english: Reducing the environmental impacts of aquaculture is a significant task.
sentences.chinese: 減少水產養殖業對環境的影響是一項重要的任務。

sentences.english: Mirando says the rapid growth of aquaculture is linked to population growth.
sentences.chinese: 米蘭多說，水產養殖業的快速增長是與人口的增長。

sentences.english: Prawn aquaculture is the industry of important economy pillar of Asia area.
sentences.chinese: 對蝦養殖業是東南亞地區的重要經濟支柱產業。

sentences.english: Study for the Development of Aquaculture Technique of Gracilaria …
sentences.chinese: 臺灣的牡蠣養殖業發展。

sentences.english: The effects and the application of probiotics in cultivation were reviewed at present paper.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了益生素的作用和在養殖業中的應用效果。

sentences.english: Artemia cysts have been applied in aquiculture, and its quality is very important.
sentences.chinese: 滷蟲卵已經普遍應用於水產養殖業，其質量至關重要。

sentences.english: Red tides constitute a threat against fisheries and cultivating fisheries off Zhejiang coast.
sentences.chinese: 赤潮已對浙江近海的漁業和養殖業構成嚴重威脅。

sentences.english: Chapter two introduces our export oriented mariculture.
sentences.chinese: 第二章介紹了我國外向型海水養殖業。

sentences.english: At present, aquaculture feed industry and the focus is mycophenolate suppression.
sentences.chinese: 目前飼料工業和養殖業的着重點是抑黴。

sentences.english: So, the breeding technology on butterflies should be improved, and promote the research of diapause.
sentences.chinese: 蝴蝶養殖業的發展將有利於推動蝴蝶滯育研究。

sentences.english: The Breeding industry of milk cows is one of the mainstay industries in the development of husbandry of Yulin City.
sentences.chinese: 奶牛養殖業是榆林市畜牧業發展的重要支柱產業之一。

definition: to get rid of the old to bring in the new (idiom); to innovate
agricultural worker/abbr. for 農業工人|农业工人/peasant and worker (in Marxism)
